title: PHP 5.5.34 is available
body:
The PHP development team announces the immediate availability of PHP 5.5.34.

This is a security release.

Several security bugs were fixed in this release.

All PHP 5.5 users are encouraged to upgrade to this version.
author: user01

title: PHP 5.6.20 is available
body:
The PHP development team announces the immediate availability of PHP 5.6.20. 

This is a security release. 

Several security bugs were fixed in this release. 

All PHP 5.6 users are encouraged to upgrade to this version.
author: user01

title: PHP 7.0.5 Released
body:
The PHP development team announces the immediate availability of PHP 7.0.5. 

This is a security release. 

Several security bugs were fixed in this release. 

All PHP 7.0 users are encouraged to upgrade to this version.
author: user01
